movie.title: Animal Crackers
movie.description_intro: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a run-down circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.
movie.description_full: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a run-down circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.

movies.title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
movies.summary: This is a very black comedy. A mob courier is hired to transport the heads of eight murder victims to a mob boss. However, the duffel bag gets mixed up with the bag of a college student who is off on a vacation in Mexico with his girlfriend and her parents. However, the mother is a recovering alcoholic whom everyone believes is delusional when she claims to have found heads.
movies.description_full: This is a very black comedy. A mob courier is hired to transport the heads of eight murder victims to a mob boss. However, the mother is a recovering alcoholic whom everyone believes is delusional when she claims to have found heads.

movies.title: Stardust
movies.summary: The passage from this world to the fantasy kingdom of Stormhold is through a breach in a wall beside an English village. In the 1800s, a boy becomes a man when he ventures through the breach in pursuit of a fallen star, to prove his love for the village beauty. The star is no lump of rock, it's a maiden, Yvaine. Tristan, the youth, is not the only one looking for her: three witches, led by Lamia, want her heart to make them young; and, the sons of the dead king of Stormhold want her because she holds a ruby that will give one of them title to the throne. Assisting Tristan are his mother, the victim of a spell, and a cross-dressing pirate of the skies. Will Tristan win his true love?

movies.title: Liar's Dice
movies.summary: The film follows Kamala, a young woman from Chitkul village and her girl child Manya, who embarks on a journey leaving their native land in search for her missing husband. Along this journey she encounters Nawazudin, a free spirited army deserter who helps them to get to their destination with his own selfish motive.

movies.title: Hey Arnold: The Jungle Movie
movies.summary: Picking up where Hey Arnold! (1996) left off, this tells the story of what happened to Arnold's parents.
movies.description_full: Picking up where Hey Arnold! (1996) left off, this tells the story of what happened to Arnold's parents.
